title: Data Cleaning: Exercises
text:
Instructions:
Recommended: Complete these exercises in the dedicated R in Pharma RStudio Cloud work space, which comes with

all packages pre-installed, and
an Rmarkdown document to fill in.

It may still be helpful to peek here to verify that your tables match the desired output.
Click here to enter R/Medicine Posit cloud work space
Otherwise: Follow along this document, work on your personal computer, and challenge yourself not to peek at the code solutions until you have completed the exercise.


Packages

library(tidyverse)



The Data
data details


Exercise 1
view first six rows of mtcars


Show the code solution
head(mtcars)

Hornet Sportabout 18.7   8  360 175 3.15 3.440 17.02  0  0    3    2
Valiant           18.1   6  225 105 2.76 3.460 20.22  1  0    3    1

title: Principals of Data Cleaning
text:
Is this course for me?
If your answer to any of the following questions is â€œyesâ€, then this is the right workshop for you.

one?
two?
three?

The workshop is designed for those with some experience in R. It will be assumed that participants can perform basic data manipulation. Experience with the {tidyverse} and the %>%/|> operator is a plus, but not required.

title: Principals of Data Cleaning
text:
Prework
Before attending the workshop please have the following installed and configured on your machine.

Recent version of R
Recent version of RStudio
Recent version of packages used in workshop.
instll_pkgs <- c("tidyverse")
install.packages(instll_pkgs)
Ensure you can knit R markdown documents??

Open RStudio and create a new Rmarkdown document
Save the document and check you are able to knit it.
